type: Tutorial Step - Look to Your Left!

definition.text: Does the price action to your left ring a bell? Do you recognize this major market crash?

paragraphs.text: You're looking at the March 12-13th, 2020 ~50% pandemic market crash! Spend a few minutes analyzing the daily chart!

In short, we can see that the market was in a downtrend since February 25th—if we take the turning south of the moving average and the breakdown of the bands as an indication of the beginning of the trend.
Take a look at the lower time frames too!
